reply.author: samham
reply.content: There's animation each min when the ball reaches the top, it drops & rolls to its place. Not sure if you mean "rotate" balls while rolling this will come at a cost of battery draining while not being much visible. The watch face was done while keeping in mind the balance between realistic animations vs battery consumption. Thanks for the feedback!
